properties.areaDesc: Mono; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 1:48PM PST until February 2 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Wind
prone areas could see gusts up to 65 mph.

* WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties and Mono County.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Minor fence damage is also possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel restrictions may be in place for
high profile vehicles along US-395 and US-95.
properties.instruction:
Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio
furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds
increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do
is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and
water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in
the event of a power outage.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY
